verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes.<s%> From the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon,<s%> as one <S%H935>goeth<s%> to <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> <S%H2704>Hazar-enan,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath;<s%> for these <S%H1961>are<s%> his <S%H6285>sides<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> and <S%H3220>west;<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H8641>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and in <S%H753>length<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the other <S%H2506>parts,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side:<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it.

The <S%H8641>oblation<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length,<s%> and of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth.<s%>

And for <S%H428>them,<s%> even for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> this <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation;<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in length, and toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length:<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof.

It shall be for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that are <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4931>charge,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> went not <S%H8582>astray<s%> <S%H3808><s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> went <S%H8582>astray.<s%>

And this <S%H8642>oblation<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H4480>offered<s%> <S%H8641><s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto them a thing most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> <S%H413>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

And over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall have <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H4171>exchange,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5674>alienate<s%> the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> over <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> shall be a <S%H2455>profane<s%> place for the <S%H5892>city,<s%> for <S%H4186>dwelling,<s%> and for <S%H4054>suburbs:<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof.

And <S%H428>these<s%> shall be the <S%H4060>measures<s%> thereof; the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

And the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

And the <S%H3498>residue<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion shall be <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6921>eastward,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3220>westward:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion; and the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for <S%H3899>food<s%> unto them that <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
And they that <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> it out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> by <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand:<s%> ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> <S%H7243>foursquare,<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the <S%H3498>residue<s%> shall be for the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> on the one <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and on the <S%H4480>other<s%> <S%H2088><s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation,<s%> and of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> over <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> <S%H5704>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> and <S%H3220>westward<s%> over <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H2506>portions<s%> for the <S%H5387>prince:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation;<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof.

Moreover from the <S%H4480>possession<s%> <S%H272><s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>possession<s%> <S%H272><s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> being in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> the <S%H5387>prince's,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for the <S%H5387>prince.<s%>

As for the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall have <S%H259>a<s%> portion.

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> shall have <S%H259>a<s%> portion.

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion.

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion.

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> portion.

And <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> even from <S%H4480>Tamar<s%> <S%H8559><s%> unto the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>strife<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> and to the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall divide by <S%H5307>lot<s%> unto the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H4480>inheritance,<s%> <S%H5159><s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H4256>portions,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6285><s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4060>measures.<s%>

And the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H6828>northward;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred:<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates;<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

And at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4060>measures:<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

At the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> with their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>

It was round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> measures: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from that <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> shall be, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H8033>there.<s%>
